00018 #ifndef __MIXIM_MIXIMDEFS_H
00019 #define __MIXIM_MIXIMDEFS_H
00020 
00021 #include <omnetpp.h>
00022 #include "miximkerneldefs.h"
00023 
00024 #if defined(MIXIM_EXPORT)
00025 #  define MIXIM_API OPP_DLLEXPORT
00026 #elif defined(MIXIM_IMPORT)
00027 #  define MIXIM_API OPP_DLLIMPORT
00028 #else
00029 #  define MIXIM_API
00030 #endif
00031 
00036 class MIXIM_API simsignalwrap_t {
00037 private:
00038   mutable volatile simsignal_t ssChangeSignal;
00039   const char *const            sSignalName;
00040 public:
00041   simsignalwrap_t(const char *const pSignalName)
00042     : ssChangeSignal(SIMSIGNAL_NULL)
00043     , sSignalName(pSignalName)
00044   {}
00045   simsignalwrap_t(const simsignalwrap_t& pCpy)
00046     : ssChangeSignal(pCpy.ssChangeSignal)
00047     , sSignalName(pCpy.sSignalName)
00048   {}
00049 
00051   operator simsignal_t () const {
00052     if (ssChangeSignal == SIMSIGNAL_NULL && sSignalName != NULL) {
00053       ssChangeSignal = cComponent::registerSignal(sSignalName);
00054       // opp_warning("%d = cComponent::registerSignal(\"%s\")", ssChangeSignal, sSignalName);
00055     }
00056     return ssChangeSignal;
00057   }
00058 private:
00059   // not allowed
00060   simsignalwrap_t()
00061     : ssChangeSignal(SIMSIGNAL_NULL)
00062     , sSignalName(NULL)
00063   {}
00064 };
00065 
00066 #endif
